articles.title: Sri Lanka air force plane crashes. killing all 4 aboard
articles.description: A Sri Lankan air force plane has crashed, killing all four crew members on board
articles.content:
The dead included two pilots and two crew members aboard the the Chinese-built Y-12 aircraft, which was on an observation mission, Seneviratne said.
It wasnt immediately clear what caused the crash.

articles.description: A father of a 3-year-old isn’t sure how to handle the mealtime prayer at gatherings.
articles.content:
Dear Carolyn: My husband, 3-year-old son and I happily spend time with my husband's family, including our 4- and 6-year-old nieces. Our little guy parrots everything they do, of course.
